transcript_preview: Today we're discussing how to enhance your development process through better design patterns and architectural decisions First, always start with clear requirements documentation Use test-driven development to ensure code quality Implement continuous integration and deployment pipelines Regular code reviews help maintain standards Document your architectural decisions in ADRs Use feature flags for gradual rollouts Monitor performance metrics continuously Automate repetitive tasks to save time
